title: Acting problems
creator_credit: International Film Bureau, Wesley Greene, Robert Edmonds and Betty Edmonds
brief_description: Dr Maurice Griesen directs four actors from the Goodman Memorial Theatre in scenes from “Tom Sawyer”. He discusses the actor’s problem of achieving characterization and theatrical terms such as improvisation and rhythm tempo.
